sentences.en: A series of setbacks have put the whole project in jeopardy.
sentences.cn: 一系列的挫折使整个项目面临失败。

sentences.en: A series of technical foul-ups delayed the launch of the new product.
sentences.cn: 一系列技术问题延误了新产品的上市。

sentences.en: Customs officials have made a series of contradictory statements about the equipment.
sentences.cn: 海关官员们对这种设备作出了一系列互相矛盾的陈述。

sentences.en: Enemy forces lobbed a series of artillery shells onto the city.
sentences.cn: 敌军对该城发起连串炮轰。

sentences.en: He begins his new series on BBC 2 at 9pm on Thursday.
sentences.cn: 周四晚上9点英国广播公司电视二台开始播放他的新连续剧。

sentences.en: He suffered a long series of illnesses with tremendous dignity and fortitude.
sentences.cn: 他凭借超乎常人的保持生命尊严的信念和顽强意志力忍受着各种病痛的折磨。

sentences.en: He was carrying on about some stupid television series.
sentences.cn: 他喋喋不休地说着某个无聊的电视连续剧。

sentences.en: I'm calling in reference to your series on prejudice.
sentences.cn: 我打电话是要谈谈你写的有关“偏见”的系列文章。

sentences.en: Mark was palmed off with a series of excuses.
sentences.cn: 马克被一连串借口打发了。

sentences.en: Meanwhile, Dusty Springfield's new TV series began a run on BBC 1.
sentences.cn: 同时，达斯蒂·斯普林菲尔德的电视剧新作开始在BBC1台播放。

sentences.en: Perot hoped to run another series of campaign infomercials.
sentences.cn: 佩罗期待着新一轮的竞选宣传节目的播出。

sentences.en: She had conceived the idea of a series of novels.
sentences.cn: 她萌生出撰写系列小说的想法。

sentences.en: The deal ended after a series of rancorous disputes.
sentences.cn: 经过一连串充满敌意的争吵，交易泡汤了。

sentences.en: The goalkeeper came into his own with a series of brilliant saves.
sentences.cn: 守门员开始进入状态，作出了一连串精彩的扑救。

sentences.en: The police are investigating a series of attacks in the area.
sentences.cn: 警方在调查该地区发生的一连串袭击事件。

sentences.en: The series goes out at 10.30pm, Fridays, on Channel 4.
sentences.cn: 这部连续剧每周五晚上10点30分在第4频道播出。

sentences.en: the series of events that led to the outbreak of war
sentences.cn: 导致战争爆发的一系列事件

sentences.en: There’s been a whole series of accidents on this road.
sentences.cn: 这条路上发生了一连串的交通事故。

phrases.tran_cn: 连续地：形成系列的排列
[物]串联电抗器；[物]平滑扼流圈
串联电阻器；附加电阻器
串联变压器；串联变换器；级联变压器
时间序列分析；时序分析

trans.tran_en: several events or actions of a similar type that happen one after the other
